document_title: Climate Change Impact on German Water Resources 2025
content_text: Projected impacts of climate change on German water resources including lakes, rivers, and groundwater. Long-term forecasting and adaptation strategies.
author: Dr. Claudia Weber

document_title: Advanced Monitoring Technologies for German Lakes 2025
content_text: Assessment of emerging monitoring technologies including IoT sensors, AI-powered analysis, and real-time data processing for German lake monitoring.
author: Dr. Robert Müller
